songs.title: Fall
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You and I
Two of a mind
This love's, one of a kind
You and I
We’re drifting
Over the edge

[Chorus]
And I will fall for you
And I will fall for you
If I fall for you
Would you fall too?

[Verse 2]
You and I
We’re learning to speak
With kisses on cheeks
You and I
We’re lifted
Over the edge

[Chorus]
And I will fall for you
And I will fall for you
If I fall for you
Would you fall too?
And I will fall for you
And I will fall for you
If I fall for you
Would you fall too?

[Outro]
Would you fall too?
Would you fall too?
Would you fall too?
Would you fall too?
